response.overview: An unexpected email reveals to Paula, a young filmmaker, the existence of a Chilean director named Alicia Armstrong who, surprisingly, shares her last name. Paula discovers that Alicia was the third female film director in Chile, having made a single film in 1926, which is now lost. Paula will try to find out everything about Alicia and her film, realizing that there is something deeper hidden behind what seems to be just a simple movie.
response.title: Alicia Armstrong Larraín
